Install
=================================================================

1) Install the cli utilities

.. code-block:: bash

  npm install @seatbelt/cli -g

2) Create a new project

.. code-block:: bash

  seatbelt --new [dirname]

3) Pick a server and orm on creation of a new project

4) Enter the directory and run the index.js

.. code-block:: bash

  cd [dirname]
  node index.js
